name: Old New Spells
description:
Expand your magical arsenal with 9 iconic spells inspired by other Heroes of Might and Magic games.

This modification adds:

Confusion
Deep Freeze
Dragon Strength
Fear
Levitation
Puppet Master
Vampirism
Vigour
Wasp Swarm
author: Warmonger, Andruids

0.9.5: Graphical lifting, some balancing improvements and adapting to the new spell format
